product_name: Nite Ize Sport Belt Safety Light - Red LED
long_description: With its bright red LED, the streamlined and lightweight Nite Ize Sport Belt Safety Light is the perfect bulk-free, all-weather, all-season way to be visible when you're out in the dark. Made of durable, weather-resistant nylon, it's flexible and comfortable to wear around your waist. Red LED light is simple to activate-press once for a steady glow and twice for flash mode; on/off switch is lockable. Webbed reflective pattern provides secondary passive visibility for added safety. 2-in. width allows you to easily attach most conventionally-sized water bottles and energy gels. Bright red LED is powered by 3 easy-to-replace AAA alkaline batteries (included) that provide up to 200 hours of illumination. Adjustable elastic waistband adjusts from 30 to 49 in. The Nite Ize Sport Belt Safety Light measures 36.75 x 2 x 0.74 in.
